settings.invalid_credentials_description: Authentication failed. Credentials for a user in the 'Domain Admins' group are required.
settings.file_server_alias_tooltip: Alternative name for the computer, used in network paths to access shared folders. It must be unique in the AD network. Can be up to 15 characters long.
settings.file_server_ip_address_tooltip: IP address to associate with the file server in the Active Directory domain. This cannot be changed if Samba is also a domain provider and other domain providers exist in the same domain.
settings.file_server_name_tooltip: Unique name for the Active Directory computer account. It will appear in DNS and cannot be changed.
settings.title: Settings
settings.credentials_required_description: Saving changes requires the credentials of a user in the 'Domain Admins' group.

welcome.title: Welcome to Samba
welcome.no_domain_configured_description: Please configure an Active Directory domain first
welcome.step_settings_description: Configure the file server identity within the Active Directory domain.
welcome.step_credentials_description: Enter the credentials of a user in the 'Domain Admins' group.
welcome.file_server_alias_tooltip: Alternative name for the computer, used in network paths to access shared folders. It must be unique in the AD network and can be changed later. Can be up to 15 characters long.
welcome.file_server_ip_address_tooltip: IP address to associate with the file server in the Active Directory domain. This cannot be changed later if Samba is also a domain provider and other domain providers exist in the same domain.
welcome.step_domain_description: Select the Active Directory domain you want to join as a member.
welcome.file_server_name_tooltip: Unique name for the Active Directory computer account, can be up to 15 characters long. It will appear in DNS and cannot be changed later.
